intent: Create a slice to support video journalists transmitting live footage from a downtown area, allowing up to 40 devices with downstream rates of 120 Mbps per device and a packet delay budget of 15 ms to keep streams smooth.

Provision a slice for a university campus event where attendees will upload and stream media, targeting uplink rates of 50 Mbps per device and downstream rates of 100 Mbps with latency capped at 20 ms.
Set up a slice for a shopping mall to improve customer mobile experience, supporting 300 devices with downstream speeds of 80 Mbps per device and a packet delay budget of 25 ms.
Deploy a slice for a media production crew using AR headsets, requiring downstream throughput of 300 Mbps per device and latency not exceeding 10 ms.
Establish a slice for commuters in a busy train station, optimized for high-capacity browsing with support for 500 devices and downstream rates of 60 Mbps per device.
